title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but marked dirty by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but marked dirty by code assist
OB: When attempting code assist, the file is marked as dirty even if no suggestions are available.
EB: If code assist has no suggestions, it should not mark the file as dirty.
SR:
1. Open the file.
2. Enable code assist.
3. Verify that there are no suggestions available.
4. Check if the file is marked as dirty.
